attributes.action: Arm Ukraine with new Anti-Aircraft weaponry.
attributes.additional_details: I'm Ukrainian settled in UK, my family is in Ukraine in one of the hotspots. It is really dangerous to move them right now. The minimum UK can do to help Ukrainians to protect their homes it's to provide additional anti-aircraft weapons. I saw the news about delivering Starstreak systems but it's unclear if this was fulfilled.
attributes.background: Russian jets continue to bomb Ukrainian cities and kill hundreds of civilians. UK needs to do more and provide Ukraine with advanced anti-aircraft weapons, as soon as possible.

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petitions open which you might like to sign:

Supply arms to the Ukrainian resistance in Russian-held territory
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610035

Pledge any necessary military support to defend Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607314
